definition: to grant/to give/to bestow/to act/to carry out
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: This pesticide is diluted with water and applied directly to the fields.
sentences.chinese: 這種殺蟲劑用水稀釋後直接施用在田裏。

sentences.english: General considerations, one-time application of dry sludge per 667m2 should be less than 8 tons.
sentences.chinese: 總體考慮，一次性每畝施用幹污泥應控制在8噸以下。

sentences.english: In irrigated desert soil, the economic benefit of resin coated urea application was superior to that of urea;
sentences.chinese: 灌漠土上施用樹脂包衣尿素的經濟效益好於普通尿素。

sentences.english: There was the significant effect of the different amount of P and K -fertilization on the mustard …
sentences.chinese: 不同磷鉀肥施用量對雪裏蕻營養品質的效應影響很大。

sentences.english: The application of cereal straw increased the soil water contents.
sentences.chinese: 施用禾本科秸杆能增加土壤的水分含量。

sentences.english: Benefits of soil and water conservation was mainly studied after water retention was used in mountain orchard.
sentences.chinese: 主要研究了山地果園施用保水劑後的蓄水保土效益。

sentences.english: Test-driving different brands with your partner can be fun.
sentences.chinese: 和朋友一路施用不同品牌的體驗過程樂趣無窮。

sentences.english: With proper rate of sulphur fertilizer application, the photosynthetic rate of soybean was increased.
sentences.chinese: 適當的施用硫肥能提高大豆光合作用強度。

sentences.english: Applied K increases the quality of lily freshly cut flower.
sentences.chinese: 施用鉀肥提高百合鮮切花的品質。

sentences.english: Application BOF would strengthen soil health and disease suppression.
sentences.chinese: 施用BOF使土壤防病能力和健康水平提高。

sentences.english: We would more apply China made Panhu ammonium phosphate in future farming.
sentences.chinese: 在今後農業生產中應大力施用盤虎牌等國產磷酸二銨。

sentences.english: No selective area sharpening should be done.
sentences.chinese: 選擇性局部銳化東西不容吧可施用。

sentences.english: However, the long-term application of biogas fertilizer from pig manure was most significant in elevating soil nutrients.
sentences.chinese: 但長期施用後對土壤養分提升最顯著的爲豬糞沼肥。

sentences.english: And their use of more herbicides to fight the weeds is sparking environmental concerns.
sentences.chinese: 他們施用更多的除草劑對抗雜草會導致環境問題。

sentences.english: The difference of applying on different period is significant.
sentences.chinese: 穗肥在不同時期施用其效果有顯著差異。
